column5: Hey guys.... when do the smelts usually run on Lake Nipissing,  I hear that smelts run in the South river, Magnetawan area as well??

I asked the same question here the other day T.J  And a few of the members have said the smelts could start running anytime after a good hard rain.. Andy and I are hopefully smelting in Britt next Saturday and your more than welcome to tag along. If the smelts arent running when we get there I guess we'll just have ta drink carlings all night buy a fire. eat jalapeno kippers, fart, and tell stupid jokes all night!
There you go boss...what more could a guy ask for...
I thought they swam? Just kiddin. We have a cottage on lake Huron and the smelt run was at about this time but I haven't seen any in the last 6 springs.
